name: generic-nzb-downloader
description: A generic NZB downloader application built with Electron, Vite, React, and TypeScript
author: Dan

scripts.dev:electron: concurrently --kill-others --raw "npm run dev" "npm run build:electron:watch" "npm run dev:electron-only"
scripts.dev:electron-only: wait-on http://localhost:5174 && sleep 2 && NODE_ENV=development npx electron . --no-sandbox --disable-gpu --disable-dev-shm-usage
scripts.electron:build: npm run build && npm run build:electron && electron-builder --publish=never
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run build && npm run build:electron && electron-builder --win --publish=never
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run build && npm run build:electron && electron-builder --linux --publish=never
